text: Hontoni safa to Maruwa wa, arra no seiseki no nakadearu. Dakara seiden ni junrei suru mono, matawa (ko junrei no tame ni sore o) otozureru mono wa, kono ryo oka o tafufu (kai-jun) shite mo tsumide wanai. Susunde yoi okonai o suru mono ni wa, hontoni arra wa yomishi, sore o yoku o mitome kudasaru
